name: @chakra-ui/core
description: Responsive and accessible React UI components built with React and Emotion

scripts.build: yarn build:cjs && yarn build:es && yarn build:copy-types
scripts.build:cjs: cross-env NODE_ENV=production BABEL_ENV=cjs babel --root-mode upward src -d dist --ignore "**/examples.js"
scripts.build:esm: cross-env NODE_ENV=production BABEL_ENV=esm babel --root-mode upward src -d dist/esm --ignore "**/examples.js"
scripts.build:es: cross-env NODE_ENV=production BABEL_ENV=es babel --root-mode upward src -d dist/es --ignore "**/examples.js"

author: Segun Adebayo <sage@adebayosegun.com>
